products.title: Amor Antique Steel Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor antique steel vertical blind
products.productdescription: A soft, light grey that doesn't try too hard to stand out, the antique steel colour is a beautifully understated blind that just quietly gets on with the job of blocking out direct sunlight without too much fanfare. Used to mellow the palettes of brightly coloured rooms, the antique steel is suitable for literally any room of the house. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Beach Hut, Antique - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Beach hut, antique - roman blind made from 100% cotton and with a smooth, tight weave, the beach hut antique is a roman blind packed with quality as well as real vintage style. An antique cream base is home to sketched images of patterned and coloured bea
products.productdescription: Made from 100% cotton and with a smooth, tight weave, the beach hut antique is a roman blind packed with quality as well as real vintage style. An antique cream base is home to sketched images of patterned and coloured beach huts, forming a cute and quirky artwork.Add to a beach-style bedroom alongside blues and creams, adding in some shabby chic accessories to continue the nautical effect. Plenty of wood furniture will match the scheme well and will bring out the brown tones in the blind.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Magnum, Antique - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Magnum, antique - day night blind the magnum in antique features a double-layered, creamy white fabric, gently interwoven with faint hints of coffee brown. The result is, true to its name, a faintly antiqued effect that adds character and depth to an othe
products.productdescription: The magnum in antique features a double-layered, creamy white fabric, gently interwoven with faint hints of coffee brown. The result is, true to its name, a faintly antiqued effect that adds character and depth to an otherwise simple blind.The antique would look stunningly pretty against a vintage pink wall in the master or guest bedroom. Furnish the room with vintage woods to complement the brown in the blind and with sweet florals and antiqued linens for a gorgeously chic effect.

products.title: Windsor, Antique - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Windsor, antique - roman blind camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. The smooth fabric blends beautifully into roman folds, stabilised with sewn in batons to prevent sagging and ensure
products.productdescription: Camel gold, with gentle ribbing and a silky, flawless finish, the windsor antique offers quite an aesthetic. The smooth fabric blends beautifully into roman folds, stabilised with sewn in batons to prevent sagging and ensure that your blind will last you for years. Opt for a striking look in your master bedroom by setting the antique with a jet black shade. Pattern the walls with a gold and cream damask wallpaper, with hints of black, and choose black bedlinen and rugs, burnished with the occasional gold accent.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Daytona, Antique White - Plantation Shutter
products.metadescription: Daytona, antique white - plantation shutter daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solut
products.productdescription: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home! Choose from three different styles.Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room. Include chalk-painted furniture and dried flower arrangements to complete the look.
